applyFunding().notice: External function to update the normalized factor as a way to pay funding.

burn(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: burn squueth and remove collateral from a vault. This burns an amount of wSqueeth.

init(address,address,address,address,add.notice: init controller with squeeth and short NFT address

mint(uint256,uint128).notice: put down collateral and mint squeeth. This mints an amount of rSqueeth.

updateOperator(uint256,address).notice: Authorize an address to modify the vault. Can be revoke by setting address to 0.
